comments.comments_text: Goal! Mikkel Damsgaard provides Balde Keita (Sampdoria) with a nice pass inside the box. It allows him to finish with a precise effort into the bottom left corner. 2:0.

comments.comments_text: Stefan de Vrij (Inter) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Paolo Valeri didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: Stefan de Vrij (Inter) outjumps the defence inside the six-yard box to meet the corner kick and scores with a great header into the bottom right corner. The goalkeeper had no chance to react. The score is now 2:1.
